comments.message: Dear Valued Customers, the technical issues with our McDelivery online system and app have since been resolved. We apologise again for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your kind understanding and patience.

Hi , I wish to feedback about your delivery standard. I placed an order thru phone ordering and was inform that the delivery need 75 min which was much longer than usual. I agree and even told the operator to expedite the order. After waiting for more than 1hr and 30 min, my food still haven't not arrived nor did I get any calls informing me of any status. In the end I call up the order line and was inform that they will get the restaurant manager to call me instead. No one call and after another 15 min , the food arrived , no apologies nor explanation on the delay of the delivery by the rider. And when i start eating my food I notice my Fries was already cold and my burger was a little warm only. I am very disappointed in your delivery standard nowadays.

I am utterly disappointed with your delivery service. 
On 30 Jun'16, I placed an order at 7pm but only to receive my food at 10pm! Looking at the receipt, it clearly shows that my order was only processed at 9.28pm! Almost 2.5hours after my order was received. When the food finally get delivered to my place at 10pm; a good 3 hours after placing my order, I realised the outlet have missed out the shaker fries! Having to wait 3 hours for our food and yet missing out the item my son was looking forward to... Hungry and disappointed, he started crying...
I called the hotline and they put me to the manager from East Point Mall. She told me she will arrange for the shaker fries to be delivered. I told her I do not want to wait for another 3 hours. She then responded in a very rude tone that she will process the refund within 14 days.
it is now 17 July; and if my math did not fail me, it's way past 14 days and I'm still waiting for my refund??? Do I have to wait for 3 months before I hear from any one???

i just call up macdonalds for breakfast delivery...ard 1043am
waited few minutes.. when ur operators handle... i ask if i can place  order for breakfast.. the answer is OH SIR.. SORRY THE TIME NOW IS 1046.. SO MEANING ?? NO BREAKFAST????

0.post_text: Dear Customers, we are currently facing technical issues with our system and are unable to accept payment via Credit Cards on our McDelivery website and mobile application. We seek your kind understanding and apologise for any inconvenience caused. Thank you.

comments.message: Do u have milk-shakes @ your store??

1.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0445 hours on 13 July 2016. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website or mobile app during this period. You may wish to contact us at our McDelivery hotline 6777 3777 to place your order. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

comments.message:
Dear Mcdonalds Sg,

First, let me tell you that I am never fussy, I dont complain and I am a nice person by most standards. 

But today I felt cheated by your service and your food. I was craving for your fries since last night but you dont deliver past 11pm so I had to wait today. I was not able to go to your store until after work today so I have to suffer the whole day not having to give in to my cravings.

Anyway, we ordered a basic meal, Cheeseburger (without pickles) and upsized coke and fries. I am so excited to eat but to my surprise, the fries is just not what I expected. I think it's left too long in the holding area. Well, my friend asked me to change it but i said it's fine. It's just so-so for me but not that terrible. Oh but hey, another surprise! After my first cheeseburger bite, surprise!  No cheese. Who orders a cheeseburger with no cheese? Since I felt cheated, I told the store manager that my cheeseburger doesn't have any cheese. I have to open my burger in front of queuing customers. What happens next is what I could not take. 

The manager, opened my burger, half-shouted at me and asked: "What do you want? You want cheese is it?" To which I answered: "Of course I want cheese, I ordered a cheeseburger!". She then got my burger which I thought she will throw away. And I was not at all surprised when she handed me the same burger and just added cheese. Wow, what is food sanitation, right?

Well, just sharing my experience and hopefully other customers will not experience it.

Oh, and sharing a photo of my very delicious cheeseburger.
FREE WIFI IM LOVING IT

Really... i orderd 2 apple pies and gave me banana?
i mean seriously,without informing me that the apple pies aren't available i cant accept this. Unless you tell me it taste like apple pie but with a different cover,also if Mc    called me and explain everything i will understand. WTF.
Huh? Was at Jurong point Mcd but there wasn't any wifi to login...
wifi better be strong cos i'll be playing games all night long
Teth Raksmey

comments.message: Cheese half slice?
This is the worse burger I have ever eaten. Please REMOVE it from the MENU.

Let me help U visualize things better in the simplest form. Basically the sauce for the MCD salted egg yolk chicken burger is not a SAUCE but more like a PASTE from a chinese steamed custard bun. U know the kind that is NOT liquefied like 流沙包，but those tat is very LUMPY in texture, it is tat kind of thing! With only 10% hint of salty egg yolk taste. So why dont MCD just call this CUSTARD chicken burger instead!? Sweet custard and meat patty is a super gross combination, can U imagine tat? 1 out of 5 stars. EAT AT YOUR OWN RISK!
Shiok ur head.... Horrible tasting burger.. The worst burger ever churn out from McDonald's.
Ordered banana pie at northpoint branch and paid $1.30 but received apple pie instead. Only found it when at home. Lousy service

I've waited 2.5 hours for my breakfast and it's now lunch time. Called hotline and waited another 7 minutes for a human. Said human then made me wait 1 minute and told me outlet manager will return my call. Waited 10 minutes and said manager has not returned my call.

After 3 hours and well into lunch time I still don't have my fucking breakfast.

WELL DONE.

Puikk😖 no syiok at all

Hi, I ordered the salted egg feast set at Ridout outlet this afternoon (around 2pm). The burger tasted nothing like 'salted egg'. It tasted plain, more like just yellow plain cooked flour. The chicken batter was also plain. Disappointed with the salted egg burger.

Wah, si bei CONFIRM NOT shiok leh. Though only ordered the normal McChicken "upsized" meal with twist fries and upsized coke, it seems like only the drinks upsized leh. The packet of Salt Pepper is even more than the twist fries which I was wondering if we're just eating salt. It used to be that the twister fries had the same amount of the medium fries, but now seems like it's just small (when I ordered UPSIZE)? 

People, don't ever try this new gimmick. Sibei waste money.

The salted egg yolk sauce needs more salted egg tase

comments.message: Singapore, we hear you! We’re now serving the Salted Egg Yolk Chicken Burger with extra sauce.
I love McDonald's but this was really disappointing - the sauce is almost non-existent and the burger bun was mushy. The salt & pepper crab shaker twister fries are not too bad though.
Not much of salted egg and it taste like eating a non spicy mcspicy...

I ordered 2 feast sets for takeaway. I did not receive the banana pies and the shaker flavouring for the fries. The burgers were also very disappointing. Bought from 24hr outlet at Serangoon central. Very disappointed and paid extra for nothing.
Erm...im so not gonna try the salted egg burger...the curly fries and the banana pie was great...the gula melaka ice cream was too sweet...no contrasting taste...  i'd rather eat at Burger King!!!!!!

I was disappointed with the burger. The salted egg yolk was too little, I could not feel the shiokness. I rather purchase a salted egg yolk pau. It seems like a repeat of the shiok shiok satay burger which the sauce was too little as well. McDonald SG, I hope you actually see this feedback and make an improvement. We paid so much for a lousy salted egg yolk burger. Seriously.

people people, you just got duped by Mac..they just said its Salted Egg Yolk and maybe they played with words..i guess the sauce is just normal egg yolk and lightly salted, thus Salted Egg Yolk..what a dissapointment..

I must say our Singapore McDonald's is going downhill. Not only the prices of the food items have gone up, the standard is going down. Your recent new item, Salted Egg Yolk Chicken Burger is one of the worst fast food I ever have. Salted egg yolk in the burger? I hardly taste it. The chicken meat is pitifully thin in meat. To pay for $7.80 for a piece of chicken without salty egg yolk? I rather buy your chicken burger. Either your staff do not know how to prepare this product or you are merely "follow the wind" (跟风) and anyhow come out with this product. For god's sake, pull down this product from your menu.

OVER FREAKIN RATED!! Disappointment, just like Rendang Burger!! Why you guys so stingy w e sauce? For e price we pay, i think we deserve that extra scoop of sauce! Theres where e name of e burger come from! And for the 368837627 times upsize for what??!!! The shaker fries comes with no powder to shake, just e bag. Reallyyy??!!
This burger is just an overpriced McChicken with lousy tasting egg yolk claimed to be salted. What a Rip off! McDonalds! Remove this menu at once! I ate this burger and it tasted awful!

The salted egg burger is the worst burger I ever had in my life. I always love burgers. Try eating 2 and I promise you won't ever have another burger in ur life. Crappiest burger ever made by macdonalds

Disappointed... Salted Egg Yolk sauce doesn't have salted egg yolk fragrance, the curry leaf does nothing to add to the fragrance because it's not slightly-fried to bring out its fragrance. Chicken overpowers the sauce as well.
The salt & pepper crab shaker fries taste just like that of salt and pepper chips, combined with seaweed shaker fries. Yes. Seaweed. Not crabs. I cannot taste much crab flavour from the seasoning... The only perk about it is the Twister Fries.

Somehow this "salted egg" sauce is the most unsalted egg-ish thing i've ever eaten in my life. This sauce is closer to the custard bun's filling than a salted egg itself. A certain company managed to "zhng" it's salted egg croissants' filling to be amazingly tasty, i wonder if Mcdonald's is able to do more research and perhaps deliver the same, if not better standard of salted egg sauce. Ganbatte!

I tasted today. Most awful burger of all. Wonder whether is it because wrapped bread is soaked ,  chicken is lost its crispy. Each bite is horrible, no level of taste,  all melted together don't figure what I take. Salted egg not salty,  must add own salt. Haiz.

Wow! Your complaints did work! McDonalds listened and made me the juiciest salted egg yolk chicken burger ever! Fries also shiok
I'm lovin' it 

Thanks @McDonald's

I dine in to try this new burger just now.  Tasteless.. dont see any extra sauce. I have to dip chili sauce so to finish the whole burger. (I wont dip chili sauce when i eat any burger previously). McChicken is better than this.
I love salted eggs to be eaten with rice n sambal belacan. Yummy  last week i tried this. Its yay to nay?? My answer is nay!!!!! The taste doesnt blend. It doesnt click. Sorry.. I only ate half.

Hi, very disappointed with your sauce, so diluted and watery, reminds me of runny ***, so different from your advert. My colleagues and I try on your 1st day launch. Super disappointed. Crowd is overwhemling and quality is bad.
If u wanna taste salted egg fried chicken sandwich come to one north at timbre+ the food truck name the  world is flat...it's so yummy

Bedok north blk 539 actually substitute salted egg w NACHO CHEESE!! Wow i didnt realise i bought nacho cheese chicken burger instead of salted egg chicken burger. 

TOTAL FAIL
There's nothing nice about this new burger. There's no salted egg taste and it's all floury. They should use mcspicy chicken patties instead. Else, the whole burger is bland.
Loved the gula melaka McFlurry.. but too much of crunchy chunks inside. Salted egg yolk burger - no taste of egg, disappointing.
Not shiok at all!!! No salted egg taste at all! It's just like ordinary McChicken with a so called "salted egg sauce". Feel cheated 👎👎👎👎👎👎
Nope just sucks doesn't even taste the egg is there so tiny potion and the chicken tasteless. I did rather u put mac spicy with salted egg yolk. Totally disappointed in you McDonald
McDonald's should consider given customers a choice between spicy or non - spicy patty. The spicy patty kills the salted egg yolk.

10.post_text:
We ‘zhng-ed’ some classic McDonald’s® treats and made them even more ‘power’! Try the all-new, super ‘shiok’ Salted Egg Yolk Chicken Burger, served with a juicy chicken patty, delicious salted egg yolk flavoured sauce and crisp lettuce. Make your meal more ‘sedap’ with our Twist & Shake Fries, Banana Pie and Gula Melaka McFlurry® with Layer Cake Bites! Get them at your nearest McDonald’s today! Don’t say we ‘bo jio’.
 
Visit Https://goo.gl/DYsNnw to find out more.

comments.message:
It's new. Super crowded. Give the staff a break and let them get the momentum of dealing with huge crowds. 
Don't complaint all the time. Things will definitely get better🤗🤗

Complain complain complain 

You'd think you guys went to some 5 star restaurant instead of McDonald's and getting served by people who love being paid by the hour roflmao

the world doesn't owe you, Singaporeans

The old ECP McDonald's has more character. The new one feels the same like all the other McDonald's in the malls. It doesn't give a new experience or feel. The least you can do is to make it more "on the beach feel". Why did McDonald's choose the carpark view and not the beach front view? So what self-order kiosk? Who wants a high-tech feel at beach McDonald's? Alah... Boring lah. Imagine if it were to be a double storey Mc'Donald's facing the beach.. Fuh.. Sell the view lah. You can change the interior but you can't change the view.

Why do some people just love to complain about anything & everything hahaha, just enjoy the efforts and ideas to those who have created it. I mean of course there will be opinions and etc, everybody is free to have their judgement but I am just thinking.. maybe we can all take a step back & appreciate what was built and created for our entertainment and for us to enjoy. :)
I loved the Old ECP MacDonald's. I am sure i would love your new Marina Cove store even more. But i fucking hate the travesty that has been named the salted egg yolk chicken burger.

Too many people there this morning around 10am even the order kiosks gave up. Maybe go when then hype dies down a bit more first.  People were very gracious tho giving seats up to those who needed it most after eating
Stacey Kim damnnnnn, new McDonald's outlet at east coast park.
Some people will enter McDonald's and charge their phone for free
Not happy just don't go. Others will be more than willing to go.
A 360 doesn't do any justice to the new outlet. Next to go is the big splash in this October. Do another 360 too I believe. #simisaialso360
The acoustic is really bad! Interior designers need to be trained to understand the implications their design has on the ambient sound. The noise is terrible there!

Went there yesterday at abt 9pm. Yes, place looks nice but was very disappointed with the dessert counter. With all the hype that's happening, my family and I found that the place was very disorganised. We can't make out what the staff was trying to explain. The counter was dirty and messy. Toppings were not replenished. Everything looks disappointing! This is what I noticed. In recent years, McDonalds have lost its standards.

Wrong place for an upscale McD. That should have been done in town. At the beach, it should be a chillax, like the last iteration of the old McD there before the refurb, when people use to skate in to get their orders. 😕
Totally an awesome place to eat and relax with the ocean view and playground nearby! I love this place very very much👍🏼❤️
Very disorganised... Why wouldn't they have a common pickup counter instead of making customers collect orders from different stations... Zzz
Such a new are to play and maybe sometimes there will be a lot of people eating McDonald's or Prata then after that head off to playground and play
Fond memories with the old mcd n looking forward for this new mcd. However pls stop students from studying at this place esp during the wends & PH!

Well, stay home and order mac-delivery Lah. 
Things will get better . Think you can do it better ! Apply for positions in mac

It's good to improve and innovate but please sell ethically, especially the current salted egg yolk burger which is a total disappointment as my order came without a single tinge of salted egg. It seems more like a normal MacChicken I reckon since there's no sauce at all as seen in the advertisement.

The q was so long, by the time we got our food, the fried were soggy :(
Pity the staff who had to shout the ready order number, muz have gotten a sore throat by the end if the shift n the manager who had to hold the door open for every one. 
I prefer the old store, more spacious n had a skate thru for skaters, was so cool
Ah...  I missed mcgriddles(is that what it's called?) and mcCrispy

If i may weigh in. From outside the new Mac looks beautiful and chic. I went last night and it didnt look as spacious as it looked like from the expressway. I feel the old one was still better in terms of layout. the McCafe used to be segregated on its own with its own decor and mood and i felt it was nicer that way. 

All things considered, i love the new menus, and as much as i dun quite buy the simplicity. It is undeniable efficient so, great job i guess?

It's terrible, abit small with so many staffs there ... Don't know where to wait , seems to be blocking everyone there... Stand at the side, the staff need to open the cupboard so decide to stand the other and they decided to mop the floor cause there black stains on the floor but everyone is avoiding everyone ... Kind of small ,, sigh abit disappointed ....

Yes, is a newly renovated places, to the public.. It's a good view and surprise.. But, I'm still very disappointed with the food they offer.. I Want my chicken fold over come back to life, and my rice burger which I last ate in 2005.. Now why is it missing for 11 years.. I'm so angry
This is what I call, brings up another notch :)

comments.message:
We made an online order at 6:08pm (order PGS-01/07/2016-511) today and the estimated delivery time was 6:50pm. The order arrived 20 minutes late at 7:10pm and was missing two packets of french fries. My husband called the restaurant which fufilled our order (Punggol Safra) at 7:14pm and was told by the manager that she will send a rider to deliver my french fries immediately. Our french fries did not reach until 7:50pm and it was already COLD & SOGGY when it reached our place.

First of all the delivery was late. Second, our delivery was incomplete. Thirdly, instead of immediately rectifying the mistake and putting our order to be completed on priority, my kids had to wait another half an hour to get COLD and SOGGY french fries.

This is simple too much to tolerate. We are frequent customers of McDelivery but we are considering cutting off McDonald's altogether for this shitty experience. We expect a proper explanation from McDonald's for this unacceptable lapse in service.
Izwan Gerrard Yay! Its back! Friday malam let's date.
We can hang here next time? Anna Belle Tang
This is supposed to be the coolest McDonald's. But the service sucks. Long waiting time, staff not well-trained. Sad...

What's gone will never be the same anymore. And why do they have charging points at the dining benches? You'll see alot more mofos sitting in the restaurant, not eating but just charging and playing phones. We who wanna eat will have to tarpao or go to another branch.

comments.message: fellow colleague's lunch. Need i say more?

Macdonalds, I feel cheated, I can do a better job with the salted egg yolk. It tasteless, honestly, it makes the burger taste awful.
Can refund my money?

Due to the hype for your newly launched "local favourites", sales figures for your outlets should be rocket-high today. However, is it only about making money and forgoing customer service?

I have just queued for about 35 minutes at your drive-thru outlet at SAFRA Yishun and was informed that your new launches were out of stock. I'm sure some affected customers still ordered since they had queued for so long but there are definitely some unhappy as they drove away without collecting any takeaways.

I would believe the management should/would have expected this issue and the least you could do was to station one staff to inform those queuing of the shortage of stock instead of informing only when it is our turn after 30 minutes.

Poorly managed.

Am so disappointed with the Salted Egg Yolk Chicken Burger that I got from Clementi Mall! There's no curry leaves and I can't even taste the sauce because it it barely there! Might as well just call it Chicken Burger Kosong!
Do you guys only include a tea spoon of sauce for your burger? McDonald's

I understand there is overwhelming demand for the Salted Egg Yolk Chicken Burger and that your outlets are finding it difficult to cope with the orders. But it is kinda ridiculous when I placed the order at 5.40pm for a 7.15pm delivery but the delivery is nowhere in sight now (8.15pm). You could have anticipated this elevated demand better and made better contingency plans. This is the same for your Hello Kitty promos. Poor planning which led to arguments and fights because of improper queue management. McD, I am sure you can do better than this. I cant even get through your hotline to get a refund now. McD, if you cannot cope with demands you should have suspended delivery services temporarily right now instead of wasting everyone's time.
Totally disappointed with the salted egg yolk chicken burger. It's more fried chicken than anything. This should be pulled from sale until a better recipe is in place. Word of mouth will spread.

Is ok if I don't get to buy the salted egg chicken burger, but can you change your queue system.. I am sure waiting time had increased.... Also food had been missing.. Where is my missing fries for my take away order....
Lolx... U get teaspoon of sauce better than mine no sauce at all! Sad!!!!!😭😭😭 McDonald's

Already see this coming from previous experience with McDonald's....

Ppl, pls request for more sauce and check your burgers before you leave!
LOL!

Why bother coming up with new flavours when you are so damn stingy with the sauces!? The sauce provided was pathetic! Come on, if you want your customers to enjoy their food please provide enough sauces to the food! Satay burger was already bad and now this! Damn disappointing! And what's with the "Chibabom" McSpicy?! It's just the normal McSpicy and we thought it was something new. This is a Sham!

Agreed with Jasmine Shi. I had mine at buona vista. No curry leaves, no sauce and tasted bland. Worst than mcchicken n mc spicy. I was also telling my colleague it should be called chicken kosong. Not shiok at all. Disappointed.

Ridiculous. Hub ordered, paid and waited half hour for his order and just been told they are sold out. So we are left with no dinner. Terrible. He said the place was in a mess and the staff couldn't manage the situation.

Can't taste the salted egg yolk. So it's just a normal McChicken without mayo. The curly salt and pepper crab flavored fries taste more like calbee prawn cracker. Went with colleagues and everyone gave it 2 thumbs down
Don't need to talk about the sauce.The meat, I couldn't even differentiate if it was fish or chicken. So soggy. Honestly worse burger i ever tasted. Waste of money! Over exaggerated advertising!

The new salted egg yolk chicken burger is disappointing. It taste so freaking plain, can't even taste any of the salted egg yolk. I think go buy Liu Sha Bao and it taste even better than this. Epic fail product

Let me help U visualize things better in the simplest form. Basically the sauce for the MCD salted egg yolk chicken burger is not a SAUCE but more like a PASTE from a chinese steamed custard bun. U know the kind that is NOT liquefied like 流沙包，but those tat is very LUMPY in texture, it is tat kind of thing! With only 10% hint of salty egg yolk taste. So why dont MCD just call this CUSTARD chicken burger instead!? Sweet custard and meat patty is a super gross combination, can U imagine tat? 1 out of 5 stars. EAT AT YOUR OWN RISK!
Sauce not found. At least it tasted like the zinger burger years ago when it was decent.

Try to order online from 11am and call several time to the hotline but delivery was not available. We try till 4pm and get our burger around 5pm plus. Super excited in the first place till we saw what is inside our burger. Just curry leave, and many curry leaves. Where is my salted egg sauce? It's just taste like mc chicken with curry leaves! So disappointing!!! Xin Lee
Horrible. Pls change the team behind these recipes. Concept good. Execution is dismal. Epic fail of a burger.
the next time mcd-sg launches a new product, there's no need to try it on the first day. Let others do it and get user feedback and see what it is really like.

Manage to grab at around 5pm today at northpoint. Tasted the salted egg burger omg so syiok....!! Love the curly fries with the shakers and banana pie. Yum! Combo up with flurry melaka ice cream. So sedap! Thumbs up McD 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 officially my favourite meal sets. Will ditch my diet for this 😆

Bought mine yesterday for our break fast. We ordered wayyyy in advance but they still delivered late (20mins late). Never mind about that. The food quality was terrible. No curry leave (also never mind,can close one eye), but barely any sauce as well!!! Expect me to close both eyes ah?? Obviously McDonald's just care about their sales cos they know ppl will still queue to try even with the bad reviews.
Salted egg yolk burger not nice! Doesn't have the salted egg yolk taste. It taste bland but the curly fries is nice. Too bad the quantity given is not much. Hope you can improve, jia you!

I usually reserve my comments but this was really bad. 

The issue is not with the quantity of the sauce, but the quality. Good idea terrible execution.

Salted egg yolk burger : major fail! 👎 not much salted egg taste and the texture of the sauce is like sweet potato. 

Banana pie: goreng pisang another version? LOL not special ley  NORMAL lo.

Twist and shake fries: not too bad at least can taste abit of the chilli crab taste 

Spicy nuggets : are u kidding me? Its like normal nugget!!
The burger had almost no salted egg yolk sauce. Major disappointment. Never trying this again. Don't queue up for this. Should demand refund. #curryleafburger

Worst experience I had at amk Mac. Went for dinner with my family the whole Mac was full and in Chaos. People waiting for their food. Numbers called no one came to collect food. The kiosk people just keep ordering when the whole team working inside was like war zone. Drinks drop on floor. Manager screaming and shouting around at the people working. Order was given wrong. The standard beside the new burger and other items were all below standard. Waiting time was super long. Despite the crowd keep ordering no one came to control the crowd and just allow then to keep ordering through the kiosk when the whole team can't handle the orders. One word Disappointing 😠

Burger was nice, but could have done with more sauce. Also kinda weird to have curry leaves in the burger. I like the flavor the curry leaf gives but not to eat the whole leaf itself. Banana pie was so so, kinda mild for me, not much banana taste. Twister shaker fries are a joke. Portion like so small only, nothing much to shake.

UPDATE: Thank you McDonald's for hearing the feedback! Apparently some stores have reported abundant sauces on their burgers so do check them out for a second time or ask for more sauce!

Maybe it's because the burger was released today and they had no time to cater to the crowds, the burger was kind of a letdown.
Salted Egg Yolk Sauce was barely present and the burger has little to no hint of salted Egg Yolk Sauce at all. Curry leaves were abundant though. 
It tasted like an upgraded McChicken but not yet a McSpicy.

Maybe it'll taste better after the hype has died down.
#dontbelievethehype

The simei outlet is badly designed waiting time had increased and so has the number of happy patrons. As for the salted egg burger, it is the worse I had eaten from macs even worse than the angry bird red bun burger. The only consolation was the curly fries was good and even so there is no crab taste to the seasoning. The R&D needs tons of improvement. And in my opinion what makes a good burger, a fresh beef patty, fresh lettuce, a generous spread of cheese and a tasty and fluffy bun. I am sure many will agree with this recipe.

I tried it and it's really tasteless.
It's like one splat of slightly lumpy tasteless salted egg on the burger. It's totally not worth my money on this burger.
If u could make the sauce taste and texture like the Mc Chicken Burger; creamy. I am sure it will be better.
Can't even taste the salted egg yolk sauce! Disappointing. And messy! And the twister shaker fries is as pathetic! Nt worth the price

Had a delivery order of the new Salted Egg Yolk Chicken Burger and would like to know why it came without any sauce what so ever. The burger was bland and didn't taste anything like Salted Egg Yolk flavor; it was sweet, barely any saltiness nor spiciness of which the flavor should have captured. Please reflect it to your North team. Really disappointed. 1/10

Tried at 1030pm at safra punggol on a Friday night (2nd day of launching)
No curry leaves and pathetic sauce. The sauce doesn't even taste like salted egg. Over hyped and over priced. Confirm not shiok for me. Please make some improvement on the sauce itself. #burgerkosong
Don't need to talk about the sauce.The meat, I couldn't even differentiate if it was fish or chicken. So soggy. Honestly worse burger i ever tasted. Waste of money! Over exaggerated advertising!

Dear Mcdonalds, Im not sure how many online orders are late today islandwide. Your marketing team better come up with a reward program to 'salvage' the bad publicity this promotion is receiving now. 

Burger: oily chicken with 'custard'?
Gula melaka ice cream: ok
Banana pie: average. Traditional Goreng pisang better
Curly fries with salt and pepper crab shake: damned salty and taste worst if your fries are soggy

Dear Macdonalds,

PLEASE PUT MORE SAUCE in the salted egg burger. I licked the bit of sauce opp the yellow wrapper and it's was actually really yummy. But the sauce in the actual burger was barely there. 

So please MORE SAUCE !

Thank You

Salted egg sauce was nothing to shout about. Could have had more punch to it. The McChicken taste was overpowering the mild salted egg sauce. Still better off getting my salted egg fix from the tze char stalls for now.

Am so disappointed with the Salted Egg Yolk Chicken Burger that I got from Clementi Mall! There's no curry leaves and I can't even taste the sauce because it it barely there! Might as well just call it Chicken Burger Kosong!
Where is the salted egg yolk sauce? It look like just a thin layer of sauce on bread and chicken. I can't even taste the salted egg york sauce. Please do something about it. Thank you

Tried one today. Requested for extra salted egg yolk sauce but even with that, there is no kick.  Its like eating mcspicy burger with no mayo. There were no curry leaves in mine either.  The texture of the salted egg yolk sauce could have been more creamier. Perhaps it would have tasted better if it was so.  Then again this will be the first and the last time i'm ever eating this burger...

Was initially excited to try the new burger but realised it turned out to be a scam.. Burger had little to no sauce (couldn't even taste any salted egg) and small portion of twister fries despite paying 60 cents more.. Compared to the picture advertised, it is very different.. Since they want to build up the hype, they should meet the demand instead of short-changing the customers..

Mac's worst burger ever; basically a mere garbage! 

The portion of salted egg sauce is pathetically non-existent, let alone any taste and flavouring. The chicken fat is very thick, and whatever sauce is available, if any in the first place, is gone when one is done with removing the fat between the skin and meat. 

Not worth even considering.

Demented Dcrze Dee Deborah Chong looks like we were lucky! our sauce really a lot and we all thought the burger was quite nice although no salted egg yolk taste. haha. XD look at all these angry people. ^^""""

Disappointing, apart from the appearance of the marketing burger to the actual burger. The taste is just a McChicken w/tasteless-cream.

Do the staff even taste the burger before selling and putting the word "confirm shiok!"? Or it is a way for MacDonald to reach their sales by selling new burger more frequently despite the taste and quality of the food? I can fall for this gimmick a few times, but eventually, i will be too dissapointed to even bother to try any new burger in future.

I buy at Safra Punggol outlet, eat it, is't not a standart taste, the salted egg soooo litter, never never taste the salted egg, better i eat salted crab more power,,, this burger with salted egg soooo tastelesssss,
wast my long Q, and sea

As mentioned in previous comments, the amount of sauce was pathetic (mine didn't even come with curry leaves LOL), not to even mention that it DIDN'T taste like salted egg at all. Didn't really know what was I tasting.... And the chicken patty is just like the patty used in mcspicy burger, expect minus the spiciness. 
Feel like this burger just plays on the whole 'salted egg' trend. All in all it's such a huge letdown. Also wanna add on, strongly feel that McDonald's overall food standards has dropped a lot.... #dontbelievethehype
Kevin Kwok said he had to taste it on the first day regardless. and he was very disappointed. so disappointed that he threw the burger away.

Sufi Yantonio maybe one of the reason uh bro they too busy making salted egg burger and forget to make mcspicy burger and say OOS 😂 anyway the twister fries is totally a ripped off very sikit and overpriced.

19.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0300 hours to 0400 hours on 24 June 2016. comments.message:
Hi Macdonalds, at approx 4.45am at bedok interchange branch this morning, an indian staff of yours called me a stupid malay.

My group of friends and I were there for our pre-dawn fasting meal. It was a long queue but food was not served fast enough. I was teasing a friend, that "at the rate they are serving, i guess many of us were to starve the whole day." Thats when one of your indian lady staff overheard and said, "if you cant wait, eat elsewhere". I told her off nicely that i was talking to my friend and she should probably be concentrating on her work. In which she replied, "cant you see that i'm working, u Stupid malay?"
I was shocked and when asked her to repeat, she said "yup. I called u stupid" with a louder tone which others can hear.

Embarrased, i told the assistant manager in charge. N when he  confronted her, she did not deny. And all your manager could do was provide this 2 complimentary cards to me instead? As i was rushing for time, i did not make such a big deal. So i am now writing to macdonalds to issue a formal apology from her. Alternatively, as a video was caught by another friend, i could also post it online and let others know of such bad service from Macdonald's.
thanks  but no thanks Mac D.. kept my daughter away from fast food eversince she's 3 yrs old and i havent had fast food for the last 5 yrs
